Tanks

Class Tank

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Tank

  • public class Tank
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a tank in the game.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tank

        public Tank(processing.core.PApplet app,
            java.lang.String playerChar,
            int x,
            int y,
            int health,
            int parachutes,
            int fuel)
        Constructs a Tank object with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet instance.
        playerChar - The character representing the player.
        x - The x-coordinate of the tank.
        y - The y-coordinate of the tank.
        health - The health points of the tank.
        parachutes - The number of parachutes the tank has.
        fuel - The fuel level of the tank.

        The health points of the tank.

      • setHealth

        public void setHealth(int newHealth)
        Sets the health points of the tank.
        Parameters:
        newHealth - The new health points of the tank, if newHealth is greater than 100, it sets health to 100.

      • hasParachute

        public boolean hasParachute()
        Checks if the tank has any parachutes.
        Returns:
        True if the tank has parachutes, otherwise False.

      • usingParachute

        public boolean usingParachute()
        Checks if the tank is currently using a parachute.
        Returns:
        True if the tank is using a parachute, otherwise False.

      • useParachute

        public void useParachute()
        Sets the tank to use a parachute.

      • usedParachute

        public void usedParachute()
        Marks the tank as having used a parachute and decrements parachute by 1.

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Updates the state of the tank, what actions it takes for what keys are being pressed.

      • draw

        public void draw(int[] colour)
        Draws the tank on the screen with the specified color.
        Parameters:
        colour - An array containing the RGB color values.

      • drive

        public void drive(java.lang.String direction)
        Moves the tank according to the specified direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction in which to move the tank ("left" or "right").

      • turretMove

        public void turretMove(java.lang.String direction)
        Moves the tank's turret up or down.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction in which to move the turret ("up" or "down").

      • turretPower

        public void turretPower(java.lang.String Pdirection)
        Adjusts the power of the turret.
        Parameters:
        Pdirection - The direction in which to adjust the power ("increase" or "decrease").
